soceities_questions.question: 'Convolutional Neural Networks can perform various types of transformation (rotations or scaling) in an input'. Is the statement correct True or False?

Data Preprocessing steps (viz rotation, scaling) is necessary before you give the data to neural network because neural network cannot do it itself. Which of the following is correct about regularized regression?
Which of the following method can be used to combine different classifiers ?
Which of the following function can be used for forecasting?
Which of the following is performed by Data Scientist?
Which of the following is most important language for Data Science?
If X predicts Y,it does mean X causes Y
The expected value or _______ of a random variable is the center of its distribution.
The square root of the variance is called the ________ deviation.
_________ computing refers to applications and services that run on a distributed network using virtualized resources.
Which of the following is essential concept related to Cloud?
Point out the wrong statement:
soceities_questions.a: All applications benefit from deployment in the cloud
soceities_questions.b: With cloud computing, you can start very small and become big very fast
soceities_questions.c: Cloud computing is revolutionary, even if the technology it is built on is evolutionary
soceities_questions.correct_answer: All applications benefit from deployment in the cloud

soceities_questions.question: Which of the following cloud concept is related to pooling and sharing of resources?
The most commonly used set of protocols uses ______ as the messaging format.
_________ as a Service is a cloud computing infrastructure that creates a development environment upon which applications may be build.
_________ is a cloud computing service model in which hardware is virtualized in the cloud.
Point out the correct statement:
soceities_questions.a: WS-+ services carried over XML messages using the SOAP protocol access remote server applications
soceities_questions.b: REST stands for Representational State Transfer
soceities_questions.c: A transaction following the rules of SOAP is considered to be RESTful
soceities_questions.correct_answer: REST stands for Representational State Transfer

soceities_questions.question: Which of the following is associated with considerable vendor lock-in?
Point out the wrong statement:
soceities_questions.a: The customer takes no responsibility for maintaining the hardware, the software, or the development of the applications
soceities_questions.b: The vendor is responsible for all the operational aspects of the service
soceities_questions.c: Google’s App Engine platform is IaaS offering
soceities_questions.correct_answer: Google’s App Engine platform is IaaS offering

soceities_questions.question: _________ is the most refined and restrictive service model.
Rackspace Cloud Service is an example of:
Point out the correct statement:
soceities_questions.a: Platforms can be based on specific types of development languages, application frameworks, or other constructs
soceities_questions.b: SaaS is the cloud-based equivalent of shrink-wrapped software
soceities_questions.c: Software as a Service (SaaS) may be succinctly described as software that is deployed on a hosted service

soceities_questions.question: Point out the wrong statement:
soceities_questions.a: SaaS applications come in all shapes and sizes
soceities_questions.b: Every computer user is familiar with SaaS systems

soceities_questions.question: Which of the following is a SaaS characteristic?
soceities_questions.a: The typical license is subscription-based or usage-based and is billed on a recurring basis
soceities_questions.b: The software is available over the Internet globally through a browser on demand
soceities_questions.c: The software and the service are monitored and maintained by the vendor

soceities_questions.question: SaaS supports multiple users and provides a shared data model through _________ model.
Point out the wrong statement:
soceities_questions.a: Abstraction enables the key benefit of cloud computing: shared, ubiquitous access
soceities_questions.b: Virtualization assigns a logical name for a physical resource and then provides a pointer to that physical resource when a request is made
soceities_questions.c: All cloud computing applications combine their resources into pools that can be assigned on demand to users
soceities_questions.correct_answer: All cloud computing applications combine their resources into pools that can be assigned on demand to users

soceities_questions.question: Which of the following type of virtualization is also characteristic of cloud computing?
The technology used to distribute service requests to resources is referred to as:
Which of the following network resources can be load balanced?
__________ authentication requires the outside use of a network security or trust service
______ is one of the more expensive and complex areas of network computing.
Which of the following is provided by Identity as a Service?
Cloud computing is a _______ system and it is necessarily unidirectional in nature.
Which of the following is most important area of concern in cloud computing?
Which of the following architectural standards is working with cloud computing industry?
Which of the following type of virtualization is found in hypervisor such as Microsoft’s Hyper-V?
Which of the following allows a virtual machine to run on two or more physical processors at the same time?

An organization wants to deploy virtual machines from a service catalog. These virtual machines have software and libraries installed that are used to develop applications. Each virtual machine will be configured with the same IP address and receive OS patches from the Internet. What will be included in the design to support these capabilities?

An organization wants to allow users to deploy services on demand. In addition, the organization wants to ensure the services can be customizable and cost information will be presented at the time of deployment. Which cloud management platform component will support these requirements?

A cloud architect has included a metering application in a cloud design. The application resides on a virtual appliance. The application vendor provides guidance for sizing the appliance. What will be part of the sizing calculations for the virtual appliance storage?
soceities_questions.a: Number of services. Number of metrics. Data retention requirements.
soceities_questions.b: Number of services.  Number of metrics. Data abstraction requirements.
soceities_questions.c: Number of segments. Number of users. Data retention policies.
soceities_questions.d: Number of targets. Number of segments. Data deduplication policies.
soceities_questions.correct_answer: Number of services. Number of metrics. Data retention requirements.

soceities_questions.question: Which common support services are often replicated between clouds in a hybrid cloud deployment?

An organization is considering the use of a cloud gateway to back up services to a public cloud. They want to use their existing backup application. What should be included in the design to optimize performance on the connection to the targeted cloud storage?

An organization is planning to use a hybrid cloud. Developers will create applications in both environments. The IT staff is concerned about the amount of bandwidth used on the link between clouds. Which recommendation can be provided to the organization to minimize bandwidth requirements?
soceities_questions.a: Place applications in the public cloud. Place dependent services in the private cloud.
soceities_questions.b: Place applications in the private cloud. Place dependent services in the public cloud.
soceities_questions.c: Place applications in either cloud. Place dependent services in the same cloud.
soceities_questions.correct_answer: Place applications in either cloud. Place dependent services in the same cloud.

soceities_questions.question: A cloud architect is sizing servers for the consumer compute resource pools. The pools will consist of hosts running a hypervisor. The architect has determined the amount of compute resources that will be used by planned services. What other factors should be considered into the sizing calculations?
soceities_questions.b: CMP message queue size and hypervisor overhead

soceities_questions.question: What accurately describes a method for delivering consumable resources using standards, policies, software, and protocols that enable provisioning, control, and configuration through a programmable interface?

A cloud design contains multiple hosts that are running a hypervisor. Each host has only two physical 10Gb network adapters. Each host will support numerous virtual machines that will be connected to any of the 40 VLANs that are defined in the physical infrastructure. These virtual machines will communicate with other virtual machines on the same VLAN. How must the access layer switch ports be configured for each host?
